word_mean: 静坐的：惯于或需要久坐的

sentence.Network_en: I don't think a sedentary life would altogether suit me.
sentence.Network_cn: 我认为长期伏案的生活一点也不适合我。

sentence.Network_en: People in sedentary jobs need to take exercise.
sentence.Network_cn: 工作上要久坐的人需要做运动.
会计是一种需要坐着工作的职业.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... supersede v 代替，取代 sedentary a 坐着的；久坐的 signal n 信号.
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... supersede v 代替，取代 sedentary a 坐着的；久坐的 signal n 信号.
“人们误以为‘久坐（Sedentary）’等同于‘不运动（no exercise）’，事实上如果有人每天在健身房锻炼30至45分钟，其余时间还是坐着…
石油词汇英语翻译(S) ... sedentary product 风化产物 sedentary 残积的 sediment bar 边缘沙洲.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent. (in the sense 'not migratory'): from French sédentaire or Latin sedentarius, from sedere 'sit'

entry.tran: 需要久坐的;长期伏案的;少活动的
entry.def: Someone who has a sedentary lifestyle or job sits down a lot of the time and does not take much exercise.

example.ex: Obesity and a sedentary lifestyle has been linked with an increased risk of heart disease.
example.tran: 肥胖和久坐不动的生活方式被认为会增加患心脏病的几率。

sentences.sentence: "forced by illness to lead a sedentary life"

auth_sentence.content: Sedentary weavers of long tales Give me the fidgets.
auth_sentence.res_content: Sedentary weavers of long tales Give me the fidgets.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Sedentary weavers of long tales Give me the fidgets.

auth_sentence.content: The remedy consists in adding to the sedentary forces.
auth_sentence.res_content: The remedy consists in adding to the sedentary forces.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The remedy consists in adding to the sedentary forces.

auth_sentence.content: If you're sedentary, you have to exercise.
auth_sentence.res_content: If you're sedentary, you have to exercise.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: If you're sedentary, you have to exercise.

stems_affixes.word_buile: as一再+sid坐+uous多……的→一再坐着[学习] →勤奋的
dis分开+sid坐+ent……的→分开坐→意见不同
in内+sid坐+ious……的→坐在内部的→不为人知的,阴险的
re再+sid坐+ual表形容词→一再坐再旁边的→多余的
sed=sid坐+ate……的→坐着的,文静的
sed=sid坐+ulous多……的→坐得多得→勤奋得
sub次一等,副手+sid旁边+iary→下面旁边的辅助的
sed=sid坐+ent+ary……的→坐着的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 意见不同,政见不同,异议

dis分开+sid坐+ent……的→分开坐→意见不同

sub在下面+sid旁边+y→下面旁边[不是主要的收入]

stems_affixes.value_cn: 考虑,细想;体谅,顾及;认为,把…看作

pre前面+sid坐+e→在前面坐→主持
re再+sid坐+e→再坐[之地]→居住
